insert into Vaccination_Record(Vaccination_Record_no, Vaccination_hours, Vaccination_content, Pet_weight, Pet_Owner_no, Pet_name, Vet_License_no, Vaccination_name) values(Vaccination_Record_no.nextval, sysdate, #{vaccinationContent}, #{petWeight}, #{petOwnerVO.petOwnerNo}, #{petOwnerVO.petVO[0].petName}, #{hospitalVO.vetList[0].vetLicenseVO.vetLicenseNo}, #{vaccinationVO.vaccinationName})
mapper.select: select Vaccination_Record_no, Vaccination_hours, Vaccination_name, Pet_Owner_name from( select Vaccination_Record_no, Vaccination_hours, Vaccination_name, Pet_Owner_name, ceil(rownum/5) as page from( select vr.Vaccination_Record_no, to_char(vr.Vaccination_hours, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as Vaccination_hours, po.Pet_Owner_name, vr.Vaccination_name from VACCINATION_RECORD vr, VACCINATION v, PET_OWNER po where vr.Pet_Owner_no=po.Pet_Owner_no and vr.Vaccination_name=v.Vaccination_name and vr.Pet_name=#{povo.petVO[0].petName} and po.Pet_Owner_tel=#{povo.petOwnerTel} and vr.Vaccination_hours between to_date(#{listVO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{listVO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.9999 order by vr.Vaccination_Record_no desc ) ) where page = #{listVO.page}

select count(*) from Vaccination_RECORD vr, VACCINATION v, PET_OWNER po where vr.Vaccination_name = v.Vaccination_name and vr.Pet_Owner_no = po.Pet_Owner_no and vr.Pet_name = #{povo.petVO[0].petName} and vr.Vaccination_hours between to_date(#{listVO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{listVO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select vr.Vaccination_hours, vr.Vaccination_name, po.Pet_Owner_name, po.Pet_Owner_tel, vr.Pet_weight, vl.Vet_name, h.Hospital_name, h.Hospital_tel from VACCINATION_RECORD vr, PET_OWNER po, VET_LICENSE vl, VET v, HOSPITAL h, VACCINATION va where vr.pet_owner_no = po.pet_owner_no and vr.Vaccination_name = va.Vaccination_name and vr.Vet_License_no = vl.Vet_License_no(+) and vl.Vet_License_no = v.Vet_License_no(+) and v.Hospital_id = h.Hospital_id(+) and Vaccination_Record_no = #{value}

select p.pet_name, p.pet_gender, p.Animal_kind_name, p.Pet_birthday from PET p, VACCINATION_RECORD vr where vr.pet_owner_no = p.pet_owner_no and vr.pet_name = p.pet_name and Vaccination_Record_no = #{value}
